author: SharonM
post_text: June 15, 2014 at 11:10 AM#1Hi everyone!I'm trying to write a macro that takesAll positive and negative groupmasters to full. Is their a way to do that in MA2?Tnx

posts.author: SharonM
posts.post_text: June 15, 2014 at 11:10 AM#1Hi everyone!I'm trying to write a macro that takesAll positive and negative groupmasters to full. Is their a way to do that in MA2?Tnx

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: June 15, 2014 at 2:33 PM#2I don't think there is any syntax to do this, you will need to use the softkeys in the groupmaster overview menu.CodeMenu "GM"---you could however try this workaround to setanygroupmaster to full:(v3)Label Group * "I am a group"Executor *."I am a group" At FullOops /nc

title: Macro for groupmaster
